problem.markdown: Q1. The condition to be fulfilled by survey lines or survey station is ( ) Survey stations must be mutually visible ( ) The main lines should form well conditioned triangles ( ) As far as possible, the main survey line should not pass through obstacles ( ) The main survey lines should fall within the boundaries of the property to be surveyed (x) All of the above Q2. In plane table survey the method used for locating details is ( ) Traversing ( ) Resection ( ) Radiation ( ) Intersection (x) (A) or (B) above Q3. The process of putting the plane table into some fixed position so that a line representing a certain direction on the plane is parallel to that direction in the field is known as (x) Orientation ( ) Resection ( ) Intersection ( ) Levelling ( ) Centring Q4. In plane table survey, the plotting of inaccessible points can be conveniently done by ( ) Method of interpolation ( ) Method of radiation ( ) Method of traversing (x) Any of the above Q5. The first, second and third temporary adjustments to be made in plane table surveying are respectively (x) levelling, centering, orientation ( ) centering, levelling, orientation ( ) orientation, centering, levelling ( ) orientation, levelling, centering
problem.p: Q1. The condition to be fulfilled by survey lines or survey station is

choicegroup.choice: Survey stations must be mutually visible
The main lines should form well conditioned triangles
As far as possible, the main survey line should not pass through obstacles
The main survey lines should fall within the boundaries of the property to be surveyed
